nodes.text: A gunrunner with a connection to the planet Corellia lived sometime during the reign of the Galactic Empire. By 3 BBY, the Corellian gunrunner shot and killed an Imperial individual who was the pilot of the Rogue Shadow, the ship of the Sith Lord Darth Vader's secret apprentice "Starkiller." The apprentice's droid PROXY would later tell the pilot's successor, Juno Eclipse, about the incident with the gunrunner.
The gunrunner was briefly mentioned in The Force Unleashed novel, which was written by Sean Williams and released in 2008.
